properties.name: Concord Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel2This is an easy and fun single track that has lots of twists and turns, and many shoreline rides.

properties.name: Concord Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel211698 Northshore Dr SW Knoxville, TennesseeThis single track trail is roughly 8 miles long and consists of many twists and turns with wonderful shoreline views. Wonderful for new bikers and a relaxing ride.

properties.name: Haw Ridge State Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel2 An incredible ride for any experienced mountain biker. An equal amount of swift downhills and burning uphills. Not only will you face roots, rocks, and logs, but there are also plenty of jumping dunes and scenery. If you do this trail, plan on being on the bike for the long haul. Also, watch out for the black snakes and spiders!

properties.name: I.C. King Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel23440 Alcoa Hwy, Knoxville, TNIntermediate to Advanced mountain biking trail consisting of 7.5 miles of single track. It is a fairly relaxing ride with many scenic views of Ft. Loudon lake.

properties.name: I.C. King Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel2This is a fairly easy 7+ mile single track, conviently located merely a few miles outside of downtown Knoxville. Be on the lookout for sudden switchbacks, and enjoy the beautiful views of Fort Loudon Lake.

properties.name: Lookout Tower Trail
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel2A relaxing trail that leads to an astonishing overlook at the end.

properties.name: Norris Dam State Park
properties.description: Posted by Dharrel2 125 Village Green Cir, Lake City, TennesseeTwenty miles of fast down hills and steep uphills, although some trails are good for beginners, you want to be in shape for this long ride!
